sect2.title: Dependencies
sect2.para: Mawk-&mawk-depversion; needs the following to be installed:
sect2.literallayout: bash: sh fileutils: chmod, cp, ln, rm binutils: as, ld diffutils: cmp gcc: cc1, collect2, cpp0, gcc grep: egrep, grep make: make sed: sed sh-utils: hostname, tee textutils: cat, tr
